title: Launcher not working for my mac
body: I see that white dot whenever i try to open LoL launcher on my mac. idk how to fix it someone help me pls

replies.body: A solid connection is required to communicate with the server and launch the patcher.  Your issue might be due to a network connection issue that's having trouble reaching the servers.  My recommendation would be to go over our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to fix this up.  Be sure to elect the Mac option for instructions specific to your OS.  Hope that helps!
